overview: Hoping to put the cuffs on criminal mastermind Socks Barstow, detective Mike Hanrohan is stymied by the fact that his younger brother Denny has joined Barstow's gang. Things get worse after a bloody shootout, in which Mike apparently guns down his own brother.
tagline: A cold-blooded cop killer meets the cop he's sworn to get...
title: Waterfront at Midnight
